name: Hanoi Sky Travel
short_description:
Hanoi Sky Travel has now become one of the best tour operator in Vietnam and has successfully helped thousands of travelers realize their dream of traveling to Vietnam.HST provides customers with abundantly and detailed destination information, answers their questions and offers tailor-made high quality Vietnam travel services.

Whether you are planning a budget holiday or a luxury escape, Hanoi Sky Travel offer great value for money. 
Our Slogan: Trust us for your Holidays!
Main Business:
1: Organizing vietnam package tour 
2: Organizing local tour such as: Halong Bay Tour, Sapa Tour, Hanoi Tour …
3: Travel business
4: Booking hotel and resort accommodation
5: Booking Air, bus, and train tickets * Car or bus rental
6: Visa service…
summary: Hanoi Sky Travel, one of the best tour operator in Vietnam
